choose.otherwise: insert into tb_voc (m_idx, writer, title, email, content, voc_type, voc_state) values(#{m_idx},#{writer},#{title},#{email},#{content},#{voc_type}, #{voc_state})
insert into tb_notice (m_idx, writer, title, content, service) values(#{m_idx},#{writer},#{title},#{content},#{service})

choose.when:
select /*+ INDEX(tb_notice tb_notice_pk) */ * from tb_notice where del_or_not = 1
and title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and content like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and writer like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
order by n_idx desc limit #{startIdx}, 10
select * from tb_notice order by n_idx desc limit #{startIdx}, 10
select * from tb_notice where del_or_not = 1 and service = #{service} order by n_idx desc limit #{startIdx}, 10

mapper.update: update tb_notice set read_cnt = (read_cnt + 1) where n_idx = #{n_idx}

choose.otherwise: update tb_notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, update_date=now() where n_idx=#{n_idx}

mapper.update: update tb_notice set del_or_not=-1, update_date=now() where n_idx=#{n_idx}

choose.when:
select count(*) from tb_notice where del_or_not = 1
and title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and content like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
and writer like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from tb_notice where del_or_not = 1
